attributes.title: Atlas Brewery
attributes.description:
Created on February 28, 2010 by leo on Sourcemap.org:

 Brewing in one of the old Aluminium Smelter buildings at Kinlochleven since February 2002.  Ales include Latitude and Wayfarer.
